markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Explosive Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2923)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=604" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 255 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This piece of ammunition is coated in gritty black soot. When activated explosive ammunition hits a target, the missile explodes in a 10-foot burst, dealing 6d6 fire damage to each creature in the area (including the target). Each creature must attempt a DC 25 basic Reflex save.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Explosive Ammunition
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 255 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 559 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 130 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 13"
pfs="Standard"
>
Explosive Ammunition (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 255 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 559 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 520 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The damage is 10d6 and the save DC is 30.
name: Explosive Ammunition
